results.title: A Study of the Effects of Metformin, a Biguanide Derivative, on Annulus Fibrosus and Nucleus Pulposus Cells.
results.text_hl: A Study of the Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, a @CHEMICAL_Biguanides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001645 @@@Biguanide@@@ Derivative, on Annulus Fibrosus and Nucleus @<m>DISEASE_Fibrocartilaginous_embolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537927 @@@Pulposus@@@ Cells.

citations.NLM: Kaya YE, Karaarslan N, Yilmaz I, Sirin DY, Akalan H, Ozbek H. A Study of the Effects of Metformin, a Biguanide Derivative, on Annulus Fibrosus and Nucleus Pulposus Cells. Turk Neurosurg. 2020;30(3):434-441. PMID: 32239484

results.title: Metformin protects against apoptosis and senescence in nucleus pulposus cells and ameliorates disc degeneration in vivo
results.text_hl: Autophagy, as well as its upstream regulator @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@, was activated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Fibrocartilaginous_embolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537927 @@@nucleus pulposus@@@ cells in a dose- and time-dependent manner.

citations.NLM: Chen D, Xia D, Pan Z, Xu D, Zhou Y, Wu Y, Cai N, Tang Q, Wang C, Yan M, Zhang JJ, Zhou K, Wang Q, Feng Y, Wang X, Xu H, Zhang X, Tian N. Metformin protects against apoptosis and senescence in nucleus pulposus cells and ameliorates disc degeneration in vivo Cell Death Dis. 2016 Oct 27;7(10):e2441. PMID: 27787519
